body.name: Glade Automatic Spray Refill and Holder Kit, Air Freshener for Home and Bathroom, Twinkling Pine & Cedar, 6.2 Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 11 hrs 26 mins
features: Turn up the holidays with Twinkling Pine & Cedar, a limited edition automatic air freshener spray from the Glade Holiday Glow Collection.
With notes of blue spruce, cedarwood and white cloves, it’s a room freshener that provides a luxurious vibe perfect for any moment.
Enjoy a fresh burst every 9, 18 or 36 minutes so you can simply activate, forget and focus on enjoying the cozy comfort of holiday bliss.
Glade spray scents are crafted by master perfumers and infused with essential oils.
Get luxury scents at everyday prices with Glade. Limited edition fragrances to turn up the holidays.
body.description: Turn up the holidays with Twinkling Pine & Cedar automatic air freshener for home use. This limited edition automatic spray air freshener is a great way to add a layer of luxurious comfort with indulgent fragrance and winter scents. This Glade Twinkling Pine & Cedar automatic air freshener dispenser surrounds you with fragrant notes of blue spruce, fresh cedarwood and white clove. A great addition for any home, this pine and cedar air freshener provides a scent that’s a perfect fit for the season. Glade winter scents are crafted by master perfumers and include fragrance infused with essential oils. This automatic spray air freshener gives a fresh burst every 9, 18 or 36 minutes so you can simply activate, forget and focus on enjoying the festive mood. This Glade air freshener spray is perfect as an air freshener for rooms anywhere in your home, even your bathroom. The Glade Holiday Glow Collection is a range of limited-time-only Glade winter scents that will add a layer of cozy indulgence and traditional comfort to any gathering, bringing those you love a little closer this holiday season. Make your home smell festive this winter with Glade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have this in the kitchen & bathroom. They work great and I love the scent. I also love the ability to change the timing on the sprayer. Great purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Provides a burst of scent
reviews.reviewText: My cat was scared of the sound with each burst of scent at first, but I love using this item to change out holiday/seasonal fragrances. This is an earthy, almost men's cologne scent. The ability to decide the time between fragrance bursts and turning it off when not needed saves money and fragrance. I will be purchasing different scents with the changing seasons. Can't wait to get more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This smells great! I keep this scent in all year long because i love it so much

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful holiday scent
reviews.reviewText: Really like this Pine and Cedar holiday scent, yet it's not overwhelming.The dispenser is very easy to fill and use right away. Simply open the unit and pop a can of scent in, then set it to go off every 9, 16 or 36 minutes. Close the door and you are all set.Just be sure to keep it away from spraying near kids and pets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hard to open
reviews.reviewText: It’s hard to open and you have to open for batteries and adjust fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells like a Christmas tree 🎄
reviews.reviewText: I ordered three of these for different rooms in my house. The scent reminds me of a live Christmas tree. You can set a timer to spray automatically on three settings. Comes with batteries and so easy to install cans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Hope you don't have arthritis
reviews.reviewText: The scent that came with it is nice but not very noticeable in the room. I have the older version of the Glade holder. But when I ordered this one, I didn't realize there had been a design change. Tried to open it the same as my other, (pushing the button on the top). That top button is now the spray button on the new version. Then tried squeezing the sides where those little grooves are, then tried squeezing near the top and in the middle. I felt pretty stupid for not being able to open it. Decided to return it but the return process directed me to contact the manufacturer instead of offering a refund. I did call them and they had me squeeze the sides of the unit again to open it. Again, it didn't work. After going back and forth with the lady on the other line trying to help me, it was determined I wasn't squeezing the sides hard enough. I guess my fingers aren't all that strong because it took an awful lot of effort - more than I would have guessed. I did get it open but not without a sore finger. So, I'm stuck with it. When it's time to change the batteries, I'll probably toss it. I do like my old Glade holder that looks the same, but pops right open by pushing a button at the top. If I can find another one of those, I'll probably buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this to keep my place smelling nice. With 2 cats, I need all the help I can get lol. But my God, this is so loud. It made me and my cats jump every time it sprayed. Also, I got 2 scents to try and they both smelled weird...very chemical-y. After a few weeks I had to turn it off. Probably better suited for an office building or public restroom.
